description.narrative: Increased evidence and policymakers' capacity to (a) formulate and revise policies, guidelines and tools for pro-poor sanitation and institutionalization of sanitation, (b) promote public private partnerships for sanitation and hygiene, (c) support equitable delivery of quality sanitation services and (d) strengthen monitoring and evaluation of sanitation and hygiene.

sector.narrative: Climate change/environmental education, awareness and advocacy
Environmental sustainability multi-thematic data/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Institutional strengthening/policy support/advocacy/education on integration of climate change concerns
Risk management and resilience/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Sanitation - improving services in rural communities (except household water treatment and storage, moving up the ladder and strengthening sustainability)
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management
WASH - Enabling environment (policies/strategies, coordination, regulation, financing, planning-monitoring-review, sector capacity development and professionalization)

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services
Water supply and Sanitation policy, planning and administration

title.narrative: China United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
China 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
China Country Office 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Increased evidence and policymakers’ capacity to (a) formulate and revise policies, guidelines and tools for pro-poor sanitation and institutionalization of sanitation, (b) promote public private partnerships for sanitation and hygiene, (c) support equitable delivery of quality sanitation services and (d) strengthen monitoring and evaluation of sanitation and hygiene.

description.narrative: Due to COVID-19 pandemic and shifts in government priorities, a few activities requiring on-site support for equitable delivery of quality sanitation services have been delayed or dropped. Environmental health related work has been moving forward with draft list of Children's Environmental Health Indicators developed and under discussion. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/07/2020

title.narrative: Number of WASH policies/standards/strategies/guidelines for rural communities, education and health facilities, all leading to financing, improved and adopted

actual.value: 2019:1 new guideline issued: Rural Household Toilet Construction Guideline issued by NHC and Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs
